attributes.action: lobby the House of Commons Autorities that MPs should loose the right to be called 'Honourable' Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of jaw dropping revelations of MPs conning the system, at the expense of the taxpayer, all MPs should loose the right to be called ‘Honourable’ Members in and out of Parliament. We the public are not fools and will not be taken for a ride. Instead, all citizens should have the right to be called ‘Honourable’ Citizens of the UK.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
